price: Kuma ba Mu aika wani Annabi* a cikin wata alƙarya ba, fãce Mun kãma mutãnenta da azãba da cũta, tsammãninsu sunã yin ƙasƙantar da kai.
arabic: وَمَآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا فِي قَرۡيَةٖ مِّن نَّبِيٍّ إِلَّآ أَخَذۡنَآ أَهۡلَهَا بِٱلۡبَأۡسَآءِ وَٱلضَّرَّآءِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَضَّرَّعُونَ
footnotes: * Daga ãyã ta 94 zuwa ãyã ta l03 duka tãlĩƙi ne dõmin farkarwa ga muhimman manganganu waɗanda ƙissoshin Annabawan nan da mutãnensu suka ƙunsa, kuma aka ce haka dai sauran Annabawa da ba a faɗa ba suka zauna da mutãnensu a cikin faɗa a tsakanin gaskiya da ƙarya.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wamā arsalnā fī qaryatin min nabiyyin illā akhadhnā ahlahā bil-basāi wal-ḍarāi laʿallahum yaḍḍarraʿūna
